lines.text: What did they have to go and make pictures talk for? Things were going along fine. You couldn't stop making money - even if you turned out a good picture you made money.
None of these bozos have ever talked on a stage. They've never spoken lines before.
Well they gotta learn, that's all.
Sure, and who's gonna teach 'em? We'll open a school of elocution and voice culture.
I don't know anything about elocution.
You don't know anything about anything, George, and if what they say about the movies is true, you'll go far.
This darling industry of yours is the most awful thing that I've ever run into. Why can't you people act like human beings, anyhow?
Susan's going to enter the talking pictures
Well, that's fine. Can she talk?
I listen to her every day.
